title: Which character is used in Python to make a single line comment?
Which one of the following is not a keyword in Python language?
Which module in the python standard library parses options received from the command line?
Why does the name of local variables start with an underscore discouraged?
answer_1: It indicates a private variable of a class
right_answer: It indicates a private variable of a class

title: What is the maximum possible length of an identifier?
What are the two main types of functions in Python?
Which of the following statements is correct regarding the object-oriented programming concept in Python?
answer_1: Classes are real-world entities while objects are not real
answer_2: Objects are real-world entities while classes are not real
answer_3: Both objects and classes are real-world entities
right_answer: Objects are real-world entities while classes are not real

title: The process of pickling in Python includes ____________
answer_1: conversion of a data table into a list
answer_2: conversion of a Python object hierarchy into byte stream
answer_3: conversion of a byte stream into Python object hierarchy
answer_4: conversion of a list into a data table
right_answer: conversion of a Python object hierarchy into byte stream
